Hi,

I try the FOP-0.19.0 and I've two problems with rendering a table:

1. No border-attribute for the fo:table-row element works!
2. If i set these attributes:  	border-style="solid" 
				border-color="black" 
				border-width="0.6pt"
				border-bottom-style="solid" 
				border-bottom-color="black" 
				border-bottom-width="0.6pt"
    at a table-cell element, then it works, but the table overflows now the  
    page.

Look to the attached zip-File

wbr

correctly does the collapse-border style. This is partly waiting on expected
clarification when the XSL spec. goes into PR.
